rooms.description: Open-plan living space with natural light and ventilation, featuring large windows on the south-east wall for morning light in adherence to Vastu principles.
Eco-friendly kitchen integrated into open plan area, equipped with energy-efficient appliances, natural ventilation through windows aligned according to Vastu (west side) for optimal airflow.
Quiet study/library space designed near a window with ample natural light, ensuring a conducive environment for reading and relaxation while following the principles of natural ventilation.
Includes utility closet, small bathroom for guests, ensuring easy access and eco-friendly waste disposal solutions as per local building norms.
